tool_description: Calculates water flow rates, pressure requirements, and pipe sizing for sprinkler and water-based suppression systems based on system design parameters.

coverage_area.description: Area to be protected in square feet

hazard_classification.description: Hazard classification (Light, Ordinary I, Ordinary II, Extra I, Extra II)

supply_pressure.description: Available water supply pressure in PSI

design_density.description: Required design density in GPM per square foot

hose_allowance.description: Fire department hose allowance in GPM

error_messages: Invalid system type: Must be a recognized water-based suppression system.
Invalid coverage area: Must be between 100 and 1000000 square feet.
Invalid hazard classification: Must be Light, Ordinary I, Ordinary II, Extra I, or Extra II.
Invalid building height: Must be between 8 and 500 feet.
Insufficient supply pressure: Supply pressure must be between 20 and 200 PSI.
Invalid pipe material: Must be steel, CPVC, or PEX.
Invalid sprinkler spacing: Must be between 6 and 20 feet.
Invalid design density: Must be between 0.1 and 1.0 GPM per square foot.
Invalid hose allowance: Must be between 0 and 1000 GPM.
usage: Input system type, coverage area, hazard classification, building height, and supply pressure. Optionally specify pipe material, sprinkler spacing, design density, and hose allowance. The tool will calculate all hydraulic requirements for the system.

total_flow_rate.description: Total required flow rate in gallons per minute

residual_pressure.description: Required residual pressure at most remote sprinkler in PSI

main_pipe_size.description: Required main pipe diameter in inches

branch_pipe_size.description: Required branch pipe diameter in inches

water_storage_required.description: Required water storage capacity in gallons

hydraulic_summary.description: Summary of hydraulic calculations and requirements
